description: Ordered set S defined by these rules: 0 and 2 are in S and if x is a nonzero number in S, then 2x-1 and 4x are in S.
comments: The numbers 2 and 4x occupy the same positions in S that 1 occupies in the infinite Fibonacci word (A003849).
references: C. Kimberling and P. Moses, Fusion, fission, and factors, The Fibonacci Quarterly 52 (2014), 136-149.
links: C. Kimberling, A Self-Generating Set and the Golden Mean, J. Integer Sequences, 3 (2000), #00.2.8.
author: _Clark Kimberling_, Mar 05 2001
